00040 WiiController::WiiController() {
00041 
00042         bdaddr_t bdaddr = *BDADDR_ANY;
00043 
00044         this->wiiMote = NULL;
00045         static int sval = 0;
00046         cout << "In constructor " << ++sval << endl;
00047 
00048         int dev_id = -1;
00049         bool isBluetoothFound = false;
00050         while(!isBluetoothFound) {
00051                 cout << "Searching for Bluetooth interface" << endl;
00052                 if((dev_id = hci_get_route(NULL)) == -1) {
00053                         cout << "Retrying" << endl;
00054                 } else isBluetoothFound = true;
00055         }
00056 
00057         cout << "Bluetooth found" << endl;
00058 
00059         cout << "Press buttons 1 + 2 to put WiiMote in Discoverable mode" << endl;
00060         while(-1 ==  cwiid_find_wiimote(&bdaddr, 5)) {
00061                 //cout << "Waiting to "
00062         }
00063 
00064         while(!this->wiiMote) {
00065                 this->wiiMote = cwiid_open(&(bdaddr),CWIID_FLAG_MESG_IFC);
00066                 if(!this->wiiMote)
00067                         cout << "Connect Fail Retry" << endl;
00068         }
00069 
00070         cout << "Connected WiiMote" << endl;
00071 
00072         cwiid_set_mesg_callback(this->wiiMote, &cwiid_callback);
00073         cwiid_command(this->wiiMote, CWIID_CMD_RPT_MODE, CWIID_RPT_BTN | CWIID_RPT_CLASSIC );
00074 
00075         cout << "Initialization success" << endl;
00076 }

00082 void cwiid_callback(cwiid_wiimote_t *wiimote, int mesg_count,
00083                 union cwiid_mesg mesg[], struct timespec *timestamp) {

00104                 break;

00106 #ifdef DEBUG

00109 #endif
00110                 control->process_classic_mesg((struct cwiid_classic_mesg *) &mesg[i]);
00111                 raise(SIGUSR1);

00113         case CWIID_MESG_ERROR:
00114                         cerr << "Unknown Message" << endl;
00115                 break;
00116         default:
00117 #ifdef DEBUG
00118                 cout << "Unsupported message" << endl;
00119 #endif
00120                 cout << mesg[i].type << endl;
00121                 break;
00122         }
00123     }

00126 void WiiController::process_btn_mesg(struct cwiid_btn_mesg *mesg) {
00127 
00128         /* Wiimote Button/Key Events */
00129         this->moteButtonsPressed = mesg->buttons & ~this->moteButtons;
00130         this->moteButtonsReleased = ~mesg->buttons & this->moteButtons;
00131         this->moteButtons = mesg->buttons;
00132 
00133 }
00134 
00135 void WiiController::process_classic_mesg(struct cwiid_classic_mesg *mesg) {
00136 
00137         /* Classic Button/Key Events */
00138         this->classicButtonsPressed = mesg->buttons & ~this->classicButtons;
00139         this->classicButtonsReleased = ~mesg->buttons & this->classicButtons;
00140         this->classicButtons = mesg->buttons;
00141 
00142         /* Classic.LStick.X */
00143         this->lXaxis = mesg->l_stick[CWIID_X];
00144 
00145         /* Classic.LStick.Y */
00146         this->lYaxis = mesg->l_stick[CWIID_Y];
00147 
00148         /* Classic.RStick.X */
00149         this->rXaxis = mesg->r_stick[CWIID_X];
00150 
00151         /* Classic.RStick.Y */
00152         this->rYaxis = mesg->r_stick[CWIID_Y];
00153 
00154         /* Classic.LAnalog */
00155         this->lAnalog = mesg->l;
00156 
00157         /* Classic.RAnalog */
00158         this->rAnalog = mesg->r;
